role.label: Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities Disclosure [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for accounts payable and accrued liabilities at the end of the reporting period.

role.label: Accounts Payable, Current
role.documentation: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

role.label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
role.documentation: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business.

role.label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as noncurrent.

role.label: Accrual for Taxes Other than Income Taxes, Current
role.documentation: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for real and property taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

role.terseLabel: Accrued liabilities and other current liabilities
role.totalLabel: Total accrued and other current liabilities
role.label: Accrued Liabilities, Current
role.documentation: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, pertaining to costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred on contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent and utilities. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

role.label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Property, Plant, and Equipment
role.documentation: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization for physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services.

role.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
role.documentation: Amount, after tax, of accumulated increase (decrease) in equity from transaction and other event and circumstance from nonowner source.

role.label: AOCI Attributable to Parent [Member]
role.documentation: Accumulated increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, attributable to the parent. Excludes net income (loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

role.label: Additional Paid in Capital, Common Stock
role.documentation: Value received from shareholders in common stock-related transactions that are in excess of par value or stated value and amounts received from other stock-related transactions. Includes only common stock transactions (excludes preferred stock transactions). May be called contributed capital, capital in excess of par, capital surplus, or paid-in capital.

role.label: Additional Paid-in Capital [Member]
role.documentation: Excess of issue price over par or stated value of the entity's capital stock and amounts received from other transactions involving the entity's stock or stockholders.

role.terseLabel: Adjustment to Non-PEO NEO Compensation Footnote
role.label: Adjustment to Non-PEO NEO Compensation Footnote [Text Block]

role.label: Amortization of Intangible Assets
role.documentation: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

role.label: Antidilutive Securities Excluded from Computation of Earnings Per Share, Amount
role.documentation: Securities (including those issuable pursuant to contingent stock agreements) that could potentially dilute basic earnings per share (EPS) or earnings per unit (EPU) in the future that were not included in the computation of diluted EPS or EPU because to do so would increase EPS or EPU amounts or decrease loss per share or unit amounts for the period presented.

role.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
role.documentation: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

role.terseLabel: Cash and Cash Equivalents and Restricted Cash
role.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Entity's cash and cash equivalents accounting policy with respect to restricted balances. Restrictions may include legally restricted deposits held as compensating balances against short-term borrowing arrangements, contracts entered into with others, or company statements of intention with regard to particular deposits; however, time deposits and short-term certificates of deposit are not generally included in legally restricted deposits.

role.periodStartLabel: Cash, cash equivalents and restricted cash at beginning of period
role.periodEndLabel: Cash, cash equivalents and restricted cash at end of period
role.totalLabel: Total cash, cash equivalents and restricted cash
role.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash, and Restricted Cash Equivalents
role.documentation: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

role.totalLabel: Increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents and restricted cash
role.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash, and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

role.label: Deferred Credits and Other Liabilities, Current
role.documentation: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of unearned revenue or income, not otherwise specified in the taxonomy, which is expected to be taken into income during the current period and current obligations not separately disclosed in the balance sheet (other liabilities, current).

role.label: Deferred Federal Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
role.documentation: Amount of deferred federal tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. Includes, but is not limited to, deferred national tax expense (benefit) for non-US (United States of America) jurisdiction.

role.label: Deferred Foreign Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
role.documentation: Amount of deferred foreign income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

role.label: Deferred Income Tax Assets, Net
role.documentation: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting.

role.label: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
role.documentation: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

role.label: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations [Abstract]
Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Net
role.documentation: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences with jurisdictional netting.

role.label: Deferred State and Local Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
role.documentation: Amount of deferred state and local tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. Includes, but is not limited to, deferred regional, territorial, and provincial tax expense (benefit) for non-US (United States of America) jurisdiction.

role.label: Deferred Tax Asset [Domain]
role.documentation: Identification of the deferred tax asset for which a valuation reserve exists.

role.label: Deferred Tax Asset [Member]
role.documentation: Deferred Tax Asset

role.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Deferred Income
role.documentation: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from deferred income.

role.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Goodwill
role.documentation: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from goodwill.

role.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Gross
role.documentation: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

role.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Intangible Assets
role.documentation: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from intangible assets, excluding goodwill.

role.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Inventory
role.documentation: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from inventory.

role.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net
role.documentation: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, without jurisdictional netting.

role.terseLabel: The above amounts are reflected in the consolidated financial statements as:
role.label: DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNetAbstract [Abstract]
role.documentation: DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNetAbstract

role.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance
role.documentation: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

role.terseLabel: Net operating losses and other loss carryforwards
role.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards
role.documentation: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible operating loss carryforwards.

role.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Other
role.documentation: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences, classified as other.

role.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Property, Plant and Equipment
role.documentation: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from property, plant, and equipment.

role.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Credit Carryforwards, Foreign
role.documentation: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible foreign tax credit carryforwards.

role.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Employee Compensation
role.documentation: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from employee compensation.

role.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Share-Based Compensation Cost
role.documentation: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from share-based compensation.

role.label: Deferred Tax Assets Tax Deferred Expense Operating Lease Liabilities
role.documentation: Deferred Tax Assets Tax Deferred Expense Operating Lease Liabilities

role.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Deferred Rent
role.documentation: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from deferred rent.

role.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance
role.documentation: Amount of deferred tax assets for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

role.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net
role.documentation: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences without jurisdictional netting.

role.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Operating Lease Right-Of-Use Assets
role.documentation: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Operating Lease Right-Of-Use Assets

role.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Prepaid Expenses
role.documentation: Amount of deferred tax consequences attributable to taxable temporary differences derived from prepaid expenses.

role.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Property, Plant and Equipment
role.documentation: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from property, plant, and equipment.

role.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Cost
role.documentation: Amount of cost for defined contribution plan.

role.terseLabel: Percentage of eligible gross cash compensation employees are allowed to invest in the savings plan
role.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Maximum Annual Contributions Per Employee, Percent
role.documentation: Maximum percentage of employee gross pay the employee may contribute to a defined contribution plan.

role.label: Depreciation
role.documentation: The amount of expense recognized in the current period that reflects the allocation of the cost of tangible assets over the assets' useful lives. Includes production and non-production related depreciation.

role.label: Derivative Instruments And Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss) Recognized In Income Net
role.documentation: The net increase or decrease in the fair value of the derivative or group of derivatives included in earnings and the aggregate foreign currency transaction gain (loss) (both realized and unrealized) included in determining net income for the reporting period.

role.label: Digital Assets [Member]
role.documentation: Digital Assets

role.label: Disaggregation of Revenue [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Disaggregation of Revenue [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about disaggregation of revenue into categories depicting how nature, amount, timing, and uncertainty of revenue and cash flows are affected by economic factor.

role.terseLabel: Schedule of Sales and Percentage of Total Net Sales by Significant Product Category
role.label: Disaggregation of Revenue [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of disaggregation of revenue into categories depicting how nature, amount, timing, and uncertainty of revenue and cash flows are affected by economic factor.

role.terseLabel: Class A Common Stock and Share-Based Compensation
role.label: Share-Based Payment Arrangement [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for share-based payment arrangement.

role.label: Document Annual Report
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a form used as an annual report.

role.label: Document Financial Statement Error Correction [Flag]
role.documentation: Indicates whether any of the financial statement period in the filing include a restatement due to error correction.

role.label: Document Fiscal Period Focus
role.documentation: Fiscal period values are FY, Q1, Q2, and Q3. 1st, 2nd and 3rd quarter 10-Q or 10-QT statements have value Q1, Q2, and Q3 respectively, with 10-K, 10-KT or other fiscal year statements having FY.

role.label: Document Fiscal Year Focus
role.documentation: This is focus fiscal year of the document report in YYYY format. For a 2006 annual report, which may also provide financial information from prior periods, fiscal 2006 should be given as the fiscal year focus. Example: 2006.

role.label: Document Period End Date
role.documentation: For the EDGAR submission types of Form 8-K: the date of the report, the date of the earliest event reported; for the EDGAR submission types of Form N-1A: the filing date; for all other submission types: the end of the reporting or transition period. The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD.

role.label: Document Transition Report
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a form used as a transition report.

role.label: Document Type
role.documentation: The type of document being provided (such as 10-K, 10-Q, 485BPOS, etc). The document type is limited to the same value as the supporting SEC submission type, or the word 'Other'.

role.label: Documents Incorporated by Reference [Text Block]
role.documentation: Documents incorporated by reference.

role.terseLabel: Dividends or Other Earnings Paid on Equity Awards not Otherwise Reflected in Total Compensation for Covered Year
role.label: Dividends or Other Earnings Paid on Equity Awards not Otherwise Reflected in Total Compensation for Covered Year [Member]
Earning Per Shares Basic and Diluted [Abstract]
role.documentation: Earning Per Shares Basic and Diluted

role.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic
role.documentation: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

role.label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted
role.documentation: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

role.label: Earnings Per Share [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for earnings per share.

role.terseLabel: Exchange rate effect on cash, cash equivalents and restricted cash
role.label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash, and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Continuing Operations
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currencies. Excludes amounts for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of domestic federal statutory tax rate applicable to pretax income (loss).

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to changes in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

role.label: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChangeInUnrecognizedTaxBenefits
role.documentation: Effective tax rate impact from the change in unrecognized tax benefits.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Foreign Income Tax Rate Differential, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations applicable to statutory income tax expense (benefit) outside of the country of domicile.

role.terseLabel: Incremental benefit of net operating loss carryback
role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation Net Operating Loss Carryback
role.documentation: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation Net Operating Loss Carryback

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

role.terseLabel: Effective income tax rate reconciliation, other
role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other, Threshold Of Items Included As A Percentage Of Earnings Before Income Taxes
role.documentation: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other, Threshold Of Items Included As A Percentage Of Earnings Before Income Taxes

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Expense (Benefit), Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

role.terseLabel: State income taxes, net of federal effect
role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, State and Local Income Taxes, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations applicable to state and local income tax expense (benefit), net of federal tax expense (benefit).

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Withholding Tax Expense, Percent
role.documentation: The portion of the difference between the effective income tax rate and domestic federal statutory income tax rate attributable to withholding tax expense.

role.terseLabel: Employee benefits, compensation and related taxes
role.label: Employee-related Liabilities, Current
role.documentation: Total of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for obligations related to services received from employees, such as accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

role.terseLabel: Nonvested award, cost not yet recognized, amount
role.label: Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Cost Not yet Recognized, Amount
role.documentation: Amount of cost not yet recognized for nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement.

role.terseLabel: Nonvested award, cost not yet recognized, period for recognition
role.label: Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Cost Not yet Recognized, Period for Recognition
role.documentation: Weighted-average period over which cost not yet recognized is expected to be recognized for award under share-based payment arrangement, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days.

role.label: Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Option [Member]
role.documentation: Share-based payment arrangement granting right, subject to vesting and other restrictions, to purchase or sell certain number of shares at predetermined price for specified period of time.

role.label: Entity Address, Address Line One
role.documentation: Address Line 1 such as Attn, Building Name, Street Name

role.label: Entity Address, City or Town
role.documentation: Name of the City or Town

role.label: Entity Address, Postal Zip Code
role.documentation: Code for the postal or zip code

role.label: Entity Address, State or Province
role.documentation: Name of the state or province.

role.label: Entity Central Index Key
role.documentation: A unique 10-digit SEC-issued value to identify entities that have filed disclosures with the SEC. It is commonly abbreviated as CIK.

role.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
role.documentation: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

role.label: Entity Current Reporting Status
role.documentation: Indicate 'Yes' or 'No' whether registrants (1) have filed all reports required to be filed by Section 13 or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 during the preceding 12 months (or for such shorter period that registrants were required to file such reports), and (2) have been subject to such filing requirements for the past 90 days. This information should be based on the registrant's current or most recent filing containing the related disclosure.

role.label: Entity Emerging Growth Company
role.documentation: Indicate if registrant meets the emerging growth company criteria.

role.label: Entity File Number
role.documentation: Commission file number. The field allows up to 17 characters. The prefix may contain 1-3 digits, the sequence number may contain 1-8 digits, the optional suffix may contain 1-4 characters, and the fields are separated with a hyphen.

role.label: Entity Filer Category
role.documentation: Indicate whether the registrant is one of the following: Large Accelerated Filer, Accelerated Filer, Non-accelerated Filer. Definitions of these categories are stated in Rule 12b-2 of the Exchange Act. This information should be based on the registrant's current or most recent filing containing the related disclosure.

role.terseLabel: Entity Incorporation, State or Country Code
role.label: Entity Incorporation, State or Country Code
role.documentation: Two-character EDGAR code representing the state or country of incorporation.

role.label: Entity Interactive Data Current
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the registrant has submitted electronically every Interactive Data File required to be submitted pursuant to Rule 405 of Regulation S-T during the preceding 12 months (or for such shorter period that the registrant was required to submit such files).

role.label: Entity Public Float
role.documentation: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

role.label: Entity Registrant Name
role.documentation: The exact name of the entity filing the report as specified in its charter, which is required by forms filed with the SEC.

role.label: Entity Shell Company
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the registrant is a shell company as defined in Rule 12b-2 of the Exchange Act.

role.label: Entity Small Business
role.documentation: Indicates that the company is a Smaller Reporting Company (SRC).

role.label: Entity Tax Identification Number
role.documentation: The Tax Identification Number (TIN), also known as an Employer Identification Number (EIN), is a unique 9-digit value assigned by the IRS.

role.label: Entity Voluntary Filers
role.documentation: Indicate 'Yes' or 'No' if the registrant is not required to file reports pursuant to Section 13 or Section 15(d) of the Act.

role.label: Entity Well-known Seasoned Issuer
role.documentation: Indicate 'Yes' or 'No' if the registrant is a well-known seasoned issuer, as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act. Is used on Form Type: 10-K, 10-Q, 8-K, 20-F, 6-K, 10-K/A, 10-Q/A, 20-F/A, 6-K/A, N-CSR, N-Q, N-1A.

role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Fair Value, Recurring and Nonrecurring [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about asset and liability measured at fair value on recurring and nonrecurring basis.

role.label: Fair Value Hierarchy and NAV [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by level within fair value hierarchy and fair value measured at net asset value per share as practical expedient.

role.label: Measurement Frequency [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by measurement frequency.

role.label: Fair Value Disclosures [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for the fair value of financial instruments (as defined), including financial assets and financial liabilities (collectively, as defined), and the measurements of those instruments as well as disclosures related to the fair value of non-financial assets and liabilities. Such disclosures about the financial instruments, assets, and liabilities would include: (1) the fair value of the required items together with their carrying amounts (as appropriate); (2) for items for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value, disclosure would include: (a) information pertinent to estimating fair value (including, carrying amount, effective interest rate, and maturity, and (b) the reasons why it is not practicable to estimate fair value; (3) significant concentrations of credit risk including: (a) information about the activity, region, or economic characteristics identifying a concentration, (b) the maximum amount of loss the entity is exposed to based on the gross fair value of the related item, (c) policy for requiring collateral or other security and information as to accessing such collateral or security, and (d) the nature and brief description of such collateral or security; (4) quantitative information about market risks and how such risks are managed; (5) for items measured on both a recurring and nonrecurring basis information regarding the inputs used to develop the fair value measurement; and (6) for items presented in the financial statement for which fair value measurement is elected: (a) information necessary to understand the reasons for the election, (b) discussion of the effect of fair value changes on earnings, (c) a description of [similar groups] items for which the election is made and the relation thereof to the balance sheet, the aggregate carrying value of items included in the balance sheet that are not eligible for the election; (7) all other required (as defined) and desired information.

role.label: Fair Value, Inputs, Level 1 [Member]
role.documentation: Quoted prices in active markets for identical assets or liabilities that the reporting entity can access at the measurement date.

role.label: Fair Value, Inputs, Level 2 [Member]
role.documentation: Inputs other than quoted prices included within level 1 that are observable for an asset or liability, either directly or indirectly, including, but not limited to, quoted prices for similar assets or liabilities in active markets, or quoted prices for identical or similar assets or liabilities in inactive markets.

role.label: Measurement Frequency [Domain]
role.documentation: Measurement frequency.

role.label: Fair Value Hierarchy and NAV [Domain]
role.documentation: Categories used to prioritize the inputs to valuation techniques to measure fair value.

role.label: Fair Value, Recurring [Member]
role.documentation: Frequent fair value measurement. Includes, but is not limited to, fair value adjustment for impairment of asset, liability or equity, frequently measured at fair value.

role.label: Financial Instrument [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of financial instrument.

role.verboseLabel: Total weighted-average amortization period for finite lived intangible assets
role.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Useful Life
role.documentation: Useful life of finite-lived intangible assets, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents the reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days.

role.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Accumulated Amortization
role.documentation: Accumulated amount of amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

role.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year One
role.documentation: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Five
role.documentation: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Four
role.documentation: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Three
role.documentation: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Two
role.documentation: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.terseLabel: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets by Major Class [Axis]
role.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets by Major Class [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by major type or class of finite-lived intangible assets.

role.terseLabel: Intangible assets with finite lives, Gross Carrying Amount
role.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Gross
role.documentation: Amount before amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

role.terseLabel: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Major Class Name [Domain]
role.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Major Class Name [Domain]
role.documentation: The major class of finite-lived intangible asset (for example, patents, trademarks, copyrights, etc.) A major class is composed of intangible assets that can be grouped together because they are similar, either by their nature or by their use in the operations of a company.

role.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net
role.documentation: Amount after amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

role.label: Fiscal Period, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for determining an entity's fiscal year or other fiscal period. This disclosure may include identification of the fiscal period end-date, the length of the fiscal period, any reporting period lag between the entity and its subsidiaries, or equity investees. If a reporting lag exists, the closing date of the entity having a different period end is generally noted, along with an explanation of the necessity for using different closing dates. Any intervening events that materially affect the entity's financial position or results of operations are generally also disclosed.

role.label: Foreign Currency Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments, Liability at Fair Value
role.documentation: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all foreign currency derivative liabilities not designated as hedging instruments.

role.label: Foreign Currency Transactions and Translations Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for (1) transactions denominated in a currency other than the reporting enterprise's functional currency, (2) translating foreign currency financial statements that are incorporated into the financial statements of the reporting enterprise by consolidation, combination, or the equity method of accounting, and (3) remeasurement of the financial statements of a foreign reporting enterprise in a hyperinflationary economy.

role.label: Goodwill and Intangible Assets Disclosure [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for goodwill and intangible assets.

role.terseLabel: Intangible Assets, Trade Names and Definite-lived Intangible Assets
role.label: Goodwill and Intangible Assets, Intangible Assets, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for intangible assets. This accounting policy may address both intangible assets subject to amortization and those that are not. The following also may be disclosed: (1) a description of intangible assets (2) the estimated useful lives of those assets (3) the amortization method used (4) how the entity assesses and measures impairment of such assets (5) how future cash flows are estimated (6) how the fair values of such asset are determined.

role.label: Gross Profit
role.documentation: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.

role.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets, Indefinite-Lived (Excluding Goodwill)
role.documentation: Amount of impairment loss resulting from write-down of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit to fair value.

role.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Domestic
role.documentation: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to domestic operations.

role.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
role.documentation: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

role.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Foreign
role.documentation: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to foreign operations, which is defined as Income or Loss generated from operations located outside the entity's country of domicile.

role.label: Statement of Income Location, Balance [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by location in statement of income where disaggregated amount has been reported.

role.label: Statement of Income Location, Balance [Domain]
role.documentation: Location in statement of income where disaggregated amount has been reported.

role.label: Income Tax Jurisdiction [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by income tax jurisdiction.

role.label: Income Tax Jurisdiction [Domain]
role.documentation: Income tax jurisdiction.

role.label: Income Tax Disclosure [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for income tax.

role.label: Income Tax Examination Years Subject To Examination
role.documentation: Income Tax Examination, Years Subject to Examination

role.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
role.documentation: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

role.label: Income Tax, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for income taxes, which may include its accounting policies for recognizing and measuring deferred tax assets and liabilities and related valuation allowances, recognizing investment tax credits, operating loss carryforwards, tax credit carryforwards, and other carryforwards, methodologies for determining its effective income tax rate and the characterization of interest and penalties in the financial statements.

role.label: Income Taxes [Line Items]
role.documentation: Income Taxes [Line Items]

role.label: Income Taxes Paid
role.documentation: Amount, before refund, of cash paid to foreign, federal, state, and local jurisdictions as income tax.

role.negatedTotalLabel: Cash (paid) refunded for income taxes, net
role.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
role.documentation: Amount, after refund, of cash paid to foreign, federal, state, and local jurisdictions as income tax.

role.label: Income Taxes [Table]
role.documentation: Income Taxes [Table]

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
role.documentation: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to vendors for goods and services received and the amount of obligations and expenses incurred but not paid.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Income Taxes
role.documentation: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the account that represents the temporary difference that results from Income or Loss that is recognized for accounting purposes but not for tax purposes and vice versa.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Inventories
role.documentation: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate value of all inventory held by the reporting entity, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.

role.terseLabel: Changes in operating assets and liabilities:
role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Operating Capital [Abstract]
Increase (Decrease) in Other Noncurrent Liabilities
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in noncurrent operating liabilities classified as other.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in prepaid expenses, and assets classified as other.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Receivables
role.documentation: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the total amount due within one year (or one operating cycle) from all parties, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.

role.negatedTerseLabel: Operating lease right-of-use assets and lease liabilities
role.label: Increase (Decrease) In Right-Of-Use Assets and Lease Liabilities
role.documentation: Increase (Decrease) In Right-Of-Use Assets and Lease Liabilities

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Stockholders' Equity [Roll Forward]
role.documentation: A roll forward is a reconciliation of a concept from the beginning of a period to the end of a period.

role.label: Increase To Contract Liabilities
role.documentation: Increase To Contract Liabilities

role.terseLabel: Indefinite and Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Gross Carrying Amount
role.label: Indefinite And Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Gross
role.documentation: Indefinite And Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Gross

role.totalLabel: Indefinite and Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net Carrying Amount
role.label: Indefinite And Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net Carrying Amount
role.documentation: Indefinite And Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net Carrying Amount

role.label: Indefinite-Lived Intangible Assets [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type or class of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit.

role.label: Indefinite-Lived Intangible Assets [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.terseLabel: Intangible assets with indefinite lives, Gross Carrying Amount
role.label: Indefinite-Lived Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
role.documentation: Amount of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit.

role.terseLabel: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets, Major Class Name [Domain]
role.label: Indefinite-Lived Intangible Assets, Major Class Name [Domain]
role.documentation: The major class of indefinite-lived intangible asset (for example, trade names, etc. but not all-inclusive), excluding goodwill. A major class is composed of intangible assets that can be grouped together because they are similar, either by their nature or by their use in the operations of the company.

role.label: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures [Line Items]

role.terseLabel: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures Adopted
role.label: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures Adopted [Flag]

role.terseLabel: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures Not Adopted
role.label: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures Not Adopted [Text Block]
Interest Income (Expense), Operating
role.documentation: Amount of interest income (expense) classified as operating.

role.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

role.label: Interest Paid, Net Of Interest Received
role.documentation: Interest Paid, Net Of Interest Received

role.label: Interest Received
role.documentation: Interest Received

role.label: Inventory, Net
role.documentation: Amount after valuation and LIFO reserves of inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Inventory, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of inventory accounting policy for inventory classes, including, but not limited to, basis for determining inventory amounts, methods by which amounts are added and removed from inventory classes, loss recognition on impairment of inventories, and situations in which inventories are stated above cost.

role.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Reserve, Inventory [Member]
role.documentation: Reserve to reduce inventory to lower of cost or net realizable value.

role.label: Inventory Valuation Reserves
role.documentation: Amount of valuation reserve for inventory.

role.label: Investment, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for investment in financial asset.

role.label: Lease, Cost
role.documentation: Amount of lease cost recognized by lessee for lease contract.

role.label: Lease, Cost [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of lessee's lease cost. Includes, but is not limited to, interest expense for finance lease, amortization of right-of-use asset for finance lease, operating lease cost, short-term lease cost, variable lease cost and sublease income.

role.label: Leasehold Rights [Member]
role.documentation: Leasehold Rights Member

role.label: Leases, Acquired-in-Place [Member]
role.documentation: This element represents the amount of value allocated by a lessor (acquirer) to lease agreements which exist at acquisition of a leased property. Such amount may include the value assigned to tenant relationships and excludes the market adjustment component of the value assigned for above or below-market leases acquired.

role.label: Lessee, Leases [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for leasing arrangement entered into by lessee.

role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Maturity [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of undiscounted cash flows of lessee's operating lease liability. Includes, but is not limited to, reconciliation of undiscounted cash flows to operating lease liability recognized in statement of financial position.

role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

role.label: Lessee, Operating Leases [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for operating leases of lessee. Includes, but is not limited to, description of operating lease and maturity analysis of operating lease liability.

role.label: Letters of Credit Outstanding, Amount
role.documentation: The total amount of the contingent obligation under letters of credit outstanding as of the reporting date.

role.label: Liabilities
role.documentation: Amount of liability recognized for present obligation requiring transfer or otherwise providing economic benefit to others.

role.label: Liabilities and Equity
role.documentation: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

role.label: Liabilities, Current
role.documentation: Total obligations incurred as part of normal operations that are expected to be paid during the following twelve months or within one business cycle, if longer.

role.label: Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
role.documentation: Fair value of financial and nonfinancial obligations.

role.label: Local Phone Number
role.documentation: Local phone number for entity.

role.label: Long-Term Debt
role.documentation: Amount, after deduction of unamortized premium (discount) and debt issuance cost, of long-term debt. Excludes lease obligation.

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Current Maturities
role.documentation: Amount, after deduction of unamortized premium (discount) and debt issuance cost, of long-term debt classified as current. Excludes lease obligation.

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Fair Value
role.documentation: The fair value amount of long-term debt whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission.

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year One
role.documentation: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Two
role.documentation: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Notes Payable, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of notes payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Type [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of long-term debt.

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Type [Domain]
role.documentation: Type of long-term debt arrangement, such as notes, line of credit, commercial paper, asset-based financing, project financing, letter of credit financing. These are debt arrangements that originally required repayment more than twelve months after issuance or greater than the normal operating cycle of the company, if longer.

role.label: Loss Contingencies [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Loss Contingencies [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about loss contingency. Excludes environmental contingency, warranty, and unconditional purchase obligation.

role.label: Magazine Subscriptions [Member]
role.documentation: Magazine Subscriptions [Member]

role.label: Marketable Securities, Current
role.documentation: Amount of investment in marketable security, classified as current.

role.label: Marketable Security, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
role.documentation: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security.

role.label: Maximum [Member]
role.documentation: Upper limit of the provided range.

role.label: Minimum [Member]
role.documentation: Lower limit of the provided range.

role.terseLabel: MNPI Disclosure Timed for Compensation Value
role.label: MNPI Disclosure Timed for Compensation Value [Flag]

role.terseLabel: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Movement in Valuation Allowances and Reserves [Roll Forward]
role.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Movement in Valuation Allowances and Reserves [Roll Forward]
role.documentation: A roll forward is a reconciliation of a concept from the beginning of a period to the end of a period.

role.label: Material Terms of Trading Arrangement [Text Block]
NOL Type [Axis]
role.documentation: NOL Type

role.label: NOL Type [Domain]
role.documentation: NOL Type

role.label: NOL With Expiration [Member]
role.documentation: NOL With Expiration

role.label: NOL Without Expiration [Member]
role.documentation: NOL Without Expiration

role.totalLabel: Net cash flows provided by (used in) financing activities
role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities [Abstract]

role.totalLabel: Net cash flows provided by (used in) investing activities
role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities [Abstract]

role.totalLabel: Net cash flows provided by (used in) operating activities
role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities [Abstract]
Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
role.documentation: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

role.label: Accounting Standards Update and Change in Accounting Principle [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for change in accounting principle. Includes, but is not limited to, nature, reason, and method of adopting amendment to accounting standards or other change in accounting principle.

role.terseLabel: Recently Adopted Accounting Pronouncement And Recent Accounting Pronouncements
role.label: New Accounting Pronouncements, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy pertaining to new accounting pronouncements that may impact the entity's financial reporting. Includes, but is not limited to, quantification of the expected or actual impact.

role.terseLabel: Non-PEO NEO Average Compensation Actually Paid Amount
role.label: Non-PEO NEO Average Compensation Actually Paid Amount

role.terseLabel: Non-PEO NEO Average Total Compensation Amount
role.label: Non-PEO NEO Average Total Compensation Amount
Noncurrent Receivable [Member]
role.documentation: Noncurrent Receivable

role.label: Notes and Loans Payable, Current
role.documentation: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of the portions of all long-term notes and loans payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

role.label: Number of Operating Segments
role.documentation: Number of operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an enterprise: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same enterprise), (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the enterprise's chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. An operating segment may engage in business activities for which it has yet to earn revenues, for example, start-up operations may be operating segments before earning revenues.

role.terseLabel: Number of separate unsecured term loans
role.label: Number Of Separate Unsecured Term Loans
role.documentation: Number Of Separate Unsecured Term Loans

role.terseLabel: Number of states the entity operates
role.label: Number of States in which Entity Operates
role.documentation: The number of states the entity operates in as of the balance sheet date.

role.label: Operating Income (Loss)
role.documentation: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

role.label: Operating Lease, Cost
role.documentation: Amount of single lease cost, calculated by allocation of remaining cost of lease over remaining lease term. Includes, but is not limited to, single lease cost, after impairment of right-of-use asset, calculated by amortization of remaining right-of-use asset and accretion of lease liability.

role.label: Operating Lease, Impairment Loss
role.documentation: Amount of loss from impairment of right-of-use asset from operating lease.

role.label: Operating Lease, Liability
role.documentation: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

role.terseLabel: Current portion of operating lease liabilities
role.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Current
role.documentation: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as current.

role.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as noncurrent.

role.label: Operating Lease, Payments
role.documentation: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease, excluding payments to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

role.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

role.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
role.documentation: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

role.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Remaining Lease Term
role.documentation: Weighted average remaining lease term for operating lease, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days.

role.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
role.documentation: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

role.label: Organization, Consolidation, Basis of Presentation, Business Description and Accounting Policies [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for the general note to the financial statements for the reporting entity which may include, descriptions of the basis of presentation, business description, significant accounting policies, consolidations, reclassifications, new pronouncements not yet adopted and changes in accounting principles.

role.label: Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
role.documentation: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
role.documentation: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

role.label: Other Assets, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

role.terseLabel: Net change in unrealized loss on available-for-sale securities
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-Sale Securities Adjustment, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
role.documentation: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of gain (loss) in value of unsold investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), attributable to parent.

role.negatedTerseLabel: Reclassification of realized loss on available-for-sale securities included in net loss
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-Sale Securities, Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
role.documentation: Amount, after reclassification adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) in value of unsold investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), attributable to parent.

role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
role.documentation: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, attributable to parent entity.

role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax
role.documentation: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

role.negatedTerseLabel: Reclassification of foreign currency gain included in net income
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI, Realized upon Sale or Liquidation, Net of Tax
role.documentation: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for translation gain (loss) realized upon the sale or liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity and foreign currency hedges that are designated and qualified as hedging instruments for hedges of the foreign currency exposure of a net investment in a foreign operation.

role.negatedTerseLabel: Reclassification of realized loss on available-for-sale securities included in net income
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Net of Tax
role.documentation: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

role.label: Other Depreciation and Amortization
role.documentation: Amount of expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of tangible and intangible assets over their remaining economic lives, classified as other.

role.label: Other Intangible Assets [Member]
role.documentation: Intangible assets classified as other.

role.label: Other Liabilities, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Other Noncash Investing and Financing Items [Abstract]
Other Noncurrent Liabilities [Member]
role.documentation: Primary financial statement caption encompassing other noncurrent liabilities.

role.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
role.documentation: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

role.label: Other Nonrecurring Gain
role.documentation: Amount of gain that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.

role.label: Other Operating Activities, Cash Flow Statement
role.documentation: Other cash or noncash adjustments to reconcile net income to cash provided by (used in) operating activities that are not separately disclosed in the statement of cash flows (for example, cash received or cash paid during the current period for miscellaneous operating activities, net change during the reporting period in other assets or other liabilities).

role.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

role.label: Payments to Acquire Marketable Securities
role.documentation: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of marketable security.

role.label: Payments to Acquire Productive Assets
role.documentation: The cash outflow for purchases of and capital improvements on property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

role.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
role.documentation: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

role.terseLabel: Peer Group Total Shareholder Return Amount
role.label: Peer Group Total Shareholder Return Amount
Plan Name [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by plan name for share-based payment arrangement.

role.label: Plan Name [Domain]
role.documentation: Plan name for share-based payment arrangement.

role.terseLabel: Prepaid expenses and other current assets
role.label: Prepaid Expense, Current
role.documentation: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.negatedLabel: Prepaid income taxes and income taxes payable
role.label: Prepaid Income Taxes And Accrued Income Taxes Payable
role.documentation: The net change during the reporting period in income taxes receivable, which represents the amount due from tax authorities for refunds of overpayments or recoveries of income taxes paid, combined with the net change during the period in the amount of cash payments due to taxing authorities for taxes that are based on the reporting entity's earnings.

role.terseLabel: Proceeds from sale of a business unit
role.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses
role.documentation: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a portion of the company's business, for example a segment, division, branch or other business, during the period.

role.label: Proceeds from Income Tax Refunds
role.documentation: Amount of income tax refund received from tax jurisdiction.

role.terseLabel: Proceeds from the issuance of shares in at-the-market (ATM) offerings, net of costs
role.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
role.documentation: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

role.terseLabel: Proceeds from maturities and sales of marketable securities
role.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Marketable Securities
role.documentation: The cash inflow associated with the aggregate amount received by the entity through sale or maturity of marketable securities (held-to-maturity or available-for-sale) during the period.

role.terseLabel: Proceeds from sale of digital assets
role.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Assets, Investing Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of other assets recognized in investing activities.

role.terseLabel: Proceeds from sale of property and equipment
role.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
role.documentation: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

role.label: Product Information [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Product and Service [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by product and service, or group of similar products and similar services.

role.label: Product and Service [Domain]
role.documentation: Product or service, or a group of similar products or similar services.

role.label: Long-Lived Tangible Asset [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment Disclosure [Text Block]

role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
role.documentation: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.verboseLabel: Property and equipment, net of accumulated depreciation of $684.2 and $851.2, respectively
role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
role.documentation: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

role.terseLabel: Property and Equipment and Assets Held for Sale
role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for long-lived, physical asset used in normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Includes, but is not limited to, work of art, historical treasure, and similar asset classified as collections.

Includes, but is not limited to, balances by class of assets, depreciation and depletion expense and method used, including composite depreciation, and accumulated deprecation.

role.label: Long-Lived Tangible Asset [Domain]
role.documentation: Listing of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include land, buildings, machinery and equipment, and other types of furniture and equipment including, but not limited to, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment and software.

role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Useful Life
role.documentation: Useful life of long lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents the reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days. Examples include, but not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

role.label: Purchase Obligation
role.documentation: Minimum amount of purchase arrangement in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services from a supplier.

role.label: Statistical Measurement [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by statistical measurement. Includes, but is not limited to, minimum, maximum, weighted average, arithmetic average, and median.

role.label: Statistical Measurement [Domain]
role.documentation: Statistical measurement. Includes, but is not limited to, minimum, maximum, weighted average, arithmetic average, and median.

role.terseLabel: Receivables, net of allowance of $4.7 and $4.4, respectively

role.documentation: The total amount due to the entity within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from outside sources, including trade accounts receivable, notes and loans receivable, as well as any other types of receivables, net of allowances established for the purpose of reducing such receivables to an amount that approximates their net realizable value.

role.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits [Roll Forward]

role.documentation: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Restatement Does Not Require Recovery [Text Block]
Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Current
role.documentation: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

role.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as noncurrent. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

role.label: Restricted Stock [Member]
role.documentation: Stock including a provision that prohibits sale or substantive sale of an equity instrument for a specified period of time or until specified performance conditions are met.

role.label: Restricted Stock Units (RSUs) [Member]

role.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)

role.label: Retained Earnings [Member]

role.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Excluding Assessed Tax
role.documentation: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

role.documentation: The entire disclosure for reporting segments including data and tables. Reportable segments include those that meet any of the following quantitative thresholds a) it's reported revenue, including sales to external customers and intersegment sales or transfers is 10 percent or more of the combined revenue, internal and external, of all operating segments b) the absolute amount of its reported profit or loss is 10 percent or more of the greater, in absolute amount of 1) the combined reported profit of all operating segments that did not report a loss or 2) the combined reported loss of all operating segments that did report a loss c) its assets are 10 percent or more of the combined assets of all operating segments.

Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.
